nodes.text: Stimsticks were a type of stimulant available during the early part of the Galactic Civil War.

Stimsticks first appeared in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 novel Heir to the Jedi, written by Kevin Hearne and published by Del Rey. They were first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends in the 2008 novel Coruscant Nights II: Street of Shadows, the second installment of the Coruscant Nights trilogy, written by Michael Reaves and published by Del Rey.
